column4: hello guys....just read about Xubuntu and wanted to take a look at it...followed the instructions on https://wiki.ubuntu.com/InstallingXubuntu, but it said   E: Couldn't find package xubuntu-desktop
i know....i made sure that the universal repository is uncomented in /etc/apt/sources.list
but it still gave me an error...really strange
http://www.psychocats.net/linux/sources.php for latest repos for hoary and breezy
